name: Carbon Dating
description:
"You slowly drift off into sleep as your mind is racing with the absolute craziness of today. What is this school’s deal? What have you gotten into? These are some of the questions filling your mind. But out of them all, you can’t help but wonder what will be your chemical romance."

Carbon transfers to Catalyst University as a second-year student. This college is filled with students from all corners of the periodic table. There will be plenty of opportunities for our hero to “bond” with another student and find a partner for the coming Molecular Dance. The dance is the most important event at CU all year. It defines a student in the eyes of their peers. Will you attract a +1 for the dance?

Consultant: Tommy Gallagher (Chemistry)

Narrative & Design: Trevor Miller (ATEC)

Art & Narrative: Haven Gibbs (ATEC)

Systems Programming: Stuart Little (Computer Science)

Graphical Programming: John McGlumphy (Computer Science) 

Photos sourced from: Shutterstock

Music from: Kevin MacLeod
